item.title: Coin Change Problem
item.description: You went to a restaurant and now you have to pay the bill. After making the payment, you need to receive a \$ 30 change. Knowing that the restaurant has an infinite amount of \$ 1, \$ 2, \$ 5, \$ 10 and \$ 20 notes, how many note combinations can you receive for this change? As you can see, there are several possible combinations, for example: 10, 10, 10 20, 10 20, 5, 5 10, 10, 5, 5 First, let’s define the variables that will be used in this problem.
